alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN AUGLAIZE AND EAST CENTRAL MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over St. Marys, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Celina, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, New Knoxville, Moulton, Buckland, Fryburg, Kossuth, Bulkhead and Neptune. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 107 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
